summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Drainage and Wastewater Utility; adjusting rates for sewer charges and amending Section 21.28.370 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 4 of Ordinance 111425), adjusting drainage rates and amending Section 21.33.030 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 2 of Ordinance 114898), and adjusting Drainage and Wastewater Utility credits and amending Section 21.76.040 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Section 4 of Ordinance 104472), as of January 1, 1991.
